title: Free True Soul Nere
content:
Free True Soul Nere Type Quest Chapter Act I Location Grymforge Reward ???

Free True Soul Nere

Free True Soul Nere is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Free True Soul Nere can be acquired during Chapter XX. Completing Free True Soul Nere will progress the story forward.

Free True Soul Nere Objectives

Sergeant Thrinn said the True Soul leading them is trapped behind the cave-in. She wants to clear it. True Soul Nere mind-melded with us. He's trapped behind a cave-in and needs us to clear the rubble
